Package au.csiro.pathling.fhirpath.execution

Class FhirpathEvaluator

java.lang.Object
au.csiro.pathling.fhirpath.execution.FhirpathEvaluator
public class FhirpathEvaluator extends Object
Evaluates FHIRPath expressions against FHIR resources.

This class is the main entry point for FHIRPath evaluation in Pathling. It provides methods to evaluate single expressions or multiple expressions against FHIR resources, handling the creation of appropriate evaluation contexts and resource resolution.

The evaluator uses a ResourceResolver to access FHIR resources, a FunctionRegistry to resolve FHIRPath functions, and can be configured with variables and evaluation options.

  • Method Details

    • fromResolver

      @Nonnull public static FhirpathEvaluator.FhirpathEvaluatorBuilder fromResolver(@Nonnull ResourceResolver resourceResolver)
      Creates a builder initialized with the specified resource resolver.

      This is a convenience method for creating a builder when you only have a resource resolver and want to use default values for other parameters.

      Parameters:
      resourceResolver - the resolver used to access FHIR resources
      Returns:
      a builder initialized with the specified resource resolver

    • evaluate

      @Nonnull public Collection evaluate(@Nonnull FhirPath path, @Nonnull Collection inputContext)
      Evaluates a FHIRPath expression with the given input context.

      This method creates an evaluation context with the specified input context and evaluates the FHIRPath expression against it. The input context is the collection that the FHIRPath expression will operate on.

      Parameters:
      path - the FHIRPath expression to evaluate
      inputContext - the input context collection to evaluate against
      Returns:
      the result of the evaluation as a Collection

    • evaluate

      @Nonnull public Collection evaluate(@Nonnull FhirPath path)
      Evaluates a FHIRPath expression with the default input context.

      This method uses the subject resource as the input context for evaluation. It's equivalent to calling evaluate(FhirPath, Collection) with the result of createDefaultInputContext() as the input context.

      Parameters:
      path - the FHIRPath expression to evaluate
      Returns:
      the result of the evaluation as a Collection

    • createDefaultInputContext

      @Nonnull public ResourceCollection createDefaultInputContext()
      Creates the default input context for evaluation.

      The default input context is the subject resource of the current evaluation context. This is typically the resource type specified when creating the evaluator.

      Returns:
      the default input context as a ResourceCollection

    • createInitialDataset

      @Nonnull public Dataset<Row> createInitialDataset()
      Creates the initial dataset for evaluation.

      This method returns the Spark Dataset that contains the data for the subject resource and any joined resources. It's used as the starting point for evaluating FHIRPath expressions.

      Returns:
      the initial Spark Dataset for evaluation
